title: Can't launch client, It just bugsplats
body:
I bugsplatted eight times by simply launching the client, I have no clue why...
I cannot play League now and cannot access the full repair button. I need some assistance now.

Edit: Found a solution after posting, still odd. (Disable Discord overlay if you have it. Should fix.)

replies.body: Running the game as admin worked for me
So many bugs, ah!  Indeed, the culprit does seem to be Discord Overlay.  Disabling it should get you squared away!
Hey, you have discord open. Try disabling the discord overlay and then reopen the game! It's stickied at the top of the forum.

> [{quoted}](name=Relaxe,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aH6QJ3tA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-23T16:52:55.854+0000)
>
> Hey, you have discord open. Try disabling the discord overlay and then reopen the game! It's stickied at the top of the forum.

Yep, it took me to the normal boards and I saw that, strange that the ingame overplays cause a CLIENT issue...
